alert.note: Alert for Southern Centre; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CENTRE AND UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mifflinburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewisburg, Mifflinburg, Linntown, New Columbia, Allenwood, Vicksburg, R.B. Winter State Park, Spruce Run Reservoir, Forest Hill, Sand Bridge State Park, West Milton, McCall Dam State Park and Bucknell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
